function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of COVID-19 through built environments due to viral exchange and air transfer by containing fomites and inducing close interactions among humans.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection transmission and spread within built environments.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to categorize and distribute areas, allocate independent ventilation and air conditioning systems, and separate disease cases.","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation and air conditioning systems, air purification technologies.","People":"Engineers, architects, hospital staff, patients, visitors.","Owner":"Architects, engineers, building owners, hospital administrators."},{"Description":"SARS-CoV-2 particles can remain and live on fomites for a period varying from a few hours to five days, depending on the materials.","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and transmission through contact with contaminated fomites.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of fomites, promoting good hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Disinfection technologies, surface cleaning technologies.","People":"Cleaning staff, building maintenance personnel, occupants of built environments.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, cleaning service providers."}]}
